H0.text: Evaporation, condensation, and precipitation are the processes included in the water cycle.

H1.text: Metamorphosis, evaporation, and respiration are processes included in the water cycle.

H2.text: Precipitation, perspiration, and mitosis are the processes included in the water cycle.

H3.text: Fixation, decomposition, and respiration are the processes included in the water cycle.

A4.text: The processes that drive these movements, or fluxes, are evaporation, transpiration, condensation, precipitation, sublimation, infiltration, surface runoff, and subsurface flow.

A5.text: The ocean holds '97% of the total water on the planet; 78% of global precipitation occurs over the ocean, and it is the source of 86% of global evaporation'.本当
